food.name: Artesanos Bakery & Café
food.description: On-campus patisserie offering a wide selection of upscale pastries including breakfast pastries, brownies, cookies, tarts, several gluten-free and vegan products, and much more. Artesano proudly serves Peet's Coffee and Tea products. Peet's is an organic coffee company offering a large variety of drinks, which include blended frozen drinks, espresso, lattes, and cappuccinos.

food.name: Brick City Café
food.description: Full breakfast and lunch entre menus, extensive salad bar, made-to-order subs, wraps, and salads, grill favorites, display cooking, rotating local specialty vendors, fresh soups, desserts, and coffee station offering Seattle’s Best blends.

food.name: Café & Market
food.description: Market-style food court offering made-to-order salads, subs, pastas, and grill favorites. Also including Jump Asian Express, pizzas, calzones, fresh and healthy grab-and-go meals and snacks, and the Crossbar rotating home-style and international chef specialties. Features a market to purchase common food and household items and caf bar serving Starbucks coffee, Freshens smoothies, and gourmet baked goods

food.name: Catalyst
food.description: Fruit smoothies, Breakfast, Lunch, and a variety of crepes , Starbucks Coffee

food.name: Control Alt Deli
food.description: Design your own sandwich from our fabulous selection of wraps, breads, meats, cheeses, veggies, and sauces or try one of our brand new or classic recipes. Additional offerings include grab and go salads, fruit, snack packs and more!

food.name: Global Village Cantina & Grille
food.description: Three distinct dining experieinces inlcuding: Salsarita's offering freshly prepared made-to-order tacos, burritos, quesadillas, Mexican pizzas, nachos, and salads with fresh ingredients and a variety of salsas and sides. A bar serving alcoholic (21 years old and over only) and non-alcoholic beverages is also available. RIT's Global Grille features cooked-to-order international cuisines including Chinese, Thai, Indian, European, Korean, and a number of vegetarian specialties prepared on a Mongolian grill using fresh ingredients. Oishii Sushi serves freshly prepared, made-to-order sushi available during peak hours during the week.

food.name: Gordon Field House Concessions
food.description: RIT Dining Services operates all concessions in the Gordon Field House and provides sports fans and concert-goers a variety of concession favorites including grill items, pizza, snacks, beverages, popcorn, and more.

food.name: RITz Sports Zone
food.description: Sports restaurant with big-screen HDTVs open for lunch, dinner, and special sporting events. Menu includes build your own salads, pizzas, subs, wraps, pasta toss, Panini sandwiches, soups, grill items,  desserts, beverages and an array of grab and go items. The RITZ also features a bar (21 years old and over only) and game room complete with pool tables and arcade games.

food.name: "The Brickyard Grill"
food.description: Hamburgers, cheeseburgers, veggie burgers, Italian sausage, hot dogs, chips, assorted fruit, bottled water, soda, and juice

food.name: Food Trucks
food.description: Get a bite to eat from the Effortlessly Healthy Food Truck, Roc City Sammich Food Truck or Thali of India

food.name: Snack Cart
food.description: Hotdogs, nachos, popcorn, candy, pretzels and bottled beverages

food.name: Food Trucks
food.description: Get a bite to eat from the Wraps on Wheels Food Truck, Le Petit Poutine Food Truck, or Ben and Jerry's Cart

food.name: Dinosaur Bar-B-Que
food.description: Pulled pork sandwiches and a selection of sides from Rochester's premier barbeque joint
